argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pm2mpfo.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | pm2mpfo.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 3 |  | pm2mpfo.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 4 |  | pm2mpfo.m | |- .* = ( .s ` Q ) |
| 5 |  | pm2mpfo.e | |- .^ = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) |
| 6 |  | pm2mpfo.x | |- X = ( var1 ` A ) |
| 7 |  | pm2mpfo.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 8 |  | pm2mpfo.q | |- Q = ( Poly1 ` A ) |
| 9 |  | pm2mpfo.l | |- L = ( Base ` Q ) |
| 10 | 7 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpl2 | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpl3 | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> M e. B ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> K e. NN0 ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 16 | #P_decpmatcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 14, 15, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` Q ) = ( mulGrp ` Q ) |
| 20 | 16, 8, 6, 4, 19, 5, 9 | #P_ply1tmcl | |- ( ( A e. Ring /\ ( M decompPMat K ) e. ( Base ` A ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( ( M decompPMat K ) .* ( K .^ X ) ) e. L ) |
| 21 | 12, 18, 15, 20 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( ( M decompPMat K ) .* ( K .^ X ) ) e. L ) |
